description:
Zamasu and Black merge into an immortal being with limitless power. Is this the end of Future Trunks’ world? Is there any hope left for a victory?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Das jüngste Gericht! - Die ultimative Kraft des Super-Gottes!
Is This the Final Judgement?! The Ultimate Power of the Absolute God
Saigo no Shinpan ka!? Zettaishin no Kyuukyoku no Power
¿El juicio final? ¡El poder definitivo del Dios supremo!
最後の審判か!? 絶対神の究極の力[パワー]
